history.proof: intros m z H1 H2 i H3. unfold not. intros H4. destruct (period_lub m z H1 H2) as [H5 _]. srun best use: Nat.le_refl, degree_diff_aux, le_lt_n_Sm unfold: P_degree_diff, lt.

original: intros m z H1 H2 i H3. unfold not. intros H4. unfold Iter_upb in H4. destruct (period_lub m z H1 H2) as [H5 _]. assert (H6: 0 < period_lub m z). { apply H5. } lia.
